author: matt_kowalski
post: As I read Freeman’s essay I respected him for at least trying to be scientific. But it did seem he was arguing from his desired conclusion. I’d like to see examples of how woodcut printing on cloth was done. Are there any examples of ink that left a chemical change on a cloth resembling the shroud? Colin Berry shows integrity in this case, even if his style is more snarky than is needed..
title: Catching a Wonderful Response to Charles Freeman
